label: VarScan2 Variant Aggregation and Masking
wrangling_procedure: Data from different samples is combined into mutationVector; "Hugo_Symbol", "Chromosome", "Start_Position", "End_Position", "Reference_Allele", "Tumor_Seq_Allele2", "Tumor_Sample_Barcode", "HGVSp_Short" and "Consequence" data are renamed accordingly and presented; "dna_vaf" data is added and is calculated by "t_alt_count"/"t_depth".
